# Potential data sources

https://www.bfs.admin.ch/bfs/fr/home/statistiques/statistique-regions/portraits-regionaux-chiffres-cles/communes.html

Or one can use stat-tab with the filter canton/district/commune

Stat-tab: https://www.pxweb.bfs.admin.ch/pxweb/fr/

Variables of interest:

  - population
  - population density
  - ev. population age groups
  - vacancies
  - new houses
  - social cover rate
  - foreigners (in%)
  - type of building
  - education
  
Take also the vars at canton's level to make deviation in comparison
